item.title: How to install Windows Server 2012 R2 on VirtualBox
item.description: This tutorial will explain how to install Windows Server 2012 R2 in a virtual machine. First, you need to have Windows Server 2012 R2 ISO file and VirtualBox installed. Create a new virtual machine on VirtualBox by clicking on New. Select type and version of the virtual machine. In this case, Windows 2012 (64-bits). Create new virtual machine Set the amount of memory (RAM). I selected 4096 MB (4 GB).
